message.content:
cs.NI, cs.IT, cs.MA, cs.SY, cs.MM 

The paper discusses a communication strategy for Low Altitude Platforms (LAPs) which are used for emergency relief and recovery operations. This involves the use of mobile terrestrial terminals on the ground and the selection of direct and cooperative links based on channel conditions for improved energy efficiency. This topic falls under the category of Networking and Internet Architecture (cs.NI) as well as Information Theory (cs.IT) since it involves the optimization of communication channels. The use of adaptive transmission techniques also involves Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence (cs.MA) and Systems and Control (cs.SY). Finally, the paper may also fall under Multimedia (cs.MM) since it discusses the use of aerial telecommunications networks.
